divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife and I was looking in the night sky and saw approx 8 or more orbs red glowing moving fast then slow , in a line then not, not like aircraft, then disappearing like a light burning out. very strange and sort of scary not seeing anything like this before. I told my wife at first they look like flares but they kept moving across the sky.
Summary: approx 8 orbs red glowing moving fast then slow not like aircraft in a line
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Tracy
There were no other sightings in Tracy on or around May 31st 2013
